entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 5:56 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
